globalSummary: Global regulatory clarity improving with US pro-crypto EO 14178, EU MiCA fully active, and multiple jurisdictions establishing clear frameworks. XRP classified as non-security in US secondary markets.

items.title: Presidential Working Group recommendations due Feb 2026
items.summary: Working Group on Digital Assets to submit framework recommendations per EO 14178 timelines.

items.title: MiCA full implementation now active across EU
items.summary: All crypto-asset service providers must comply with MiCA licensing and operational requirements.

items.title: Japan JFSA confirms XRP as regulated crypto-asset
items.summary: JFSA classification enables continued exchange listings and institutional custody in Japan.

items.title: Singapore MAS issues updated DPT guidance
items.summary: Revised Digital Payment Token framework clarifies custody and AML requirements for XRP services.

items.title: Dubai VARA approves three XRPL-based service providers
items.summary: Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority licenses expand XRPL ecosystem presence in UAE.

items.title: UK FCA consults on crypto promotion rules updates
items.summary: Financial Conduct Authority seeking input on revised crypto marketing and disclosure requirements.

items.title: GENIUS Act quarterly reporting requirements begin
items.summary: Stablecoin issuers including RLUSD must file first quarterly compliance reports.
